com.google.appinventor.components.runtime

Class SoundRecorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.AndroidNonvisibleComponent
      • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.SoundRecorder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component

    public final class SoundRecorder
extends AndroidNonvisibleComponent
implements Component
    Multimedia component that records audio using android.media.MediaRecorder.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  SoundRecorder.RecordingController
      This class encapsulates the required state during recording.
